GUIDELINES\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/dcbc8772-1413-4299-ba99-c195a56f9b69/image2019-7-9_12-47-37.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":745,\"height\":457}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Selection committee should assess all nominations from their portfolio using the below scorecard.\\n\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nCriteria Scorecard\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Is it something that embodies company values?\\nIs it something that has helped your portfolio achieve its mission and goals?\\nIs it something that exhibits engineering excellence?\\nIs it something above and beyond the call of duty?\\nIs it something others are noticing and talking about?\\nIs it something that is considered as a thankless job?\\nIs it something that has impacted company or team business results?\\n\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nBirthday Wishes\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Associates shall be awarded with 500 points which can be redeemed equivalent to the point value through Reward card (Zeta).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Anniversary This appreciation is sent to all the associates on their every one-year anniversary with EPAM Systems.\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Nomination\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": HR will maintain the database of the tenure of the associate with EPAM Systems\\n\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nRecognition method\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": Anniversary Card shall be handed over to the associate by respective RM's as token of appreciation.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
